document_data.name: Soothsayer's Way
document_data.starts: [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Soothsayer's Way''' was a secondary avenue in [[Waterdeep]] that began in the city's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] and spanned westward into the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]].
document_data.Geography: This road ran in a straight line west from [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]], this Trades Ward portion of it being paved in cobblestone. Once it crossed through [[Snail Street]], the road was paved in hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]]. As it continued on, Soothsayer's Way became the southern terminus of [[Soldier's Street]], the northern terminus of [[Belnimbra's Street]], and passed through [[Cook Street]]. Finally, the road ended in a dead-end before [[Castle Waterdeep]].

Notable Locations.Cobblers' & Corvisers' House: Guildhall of the [[Order of Cobblers & Corvisers]].
